title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 157 - Public Access To Canal Corporation Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 157 - Public Access To Canal Corporation Records

State Regulations
§ 157.1 - Records available for inspection and copying; fees
§ 157.2 - Rights of party denied access to records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 157

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, § 382[7]; Public Officers Law, §§87, 89

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
